Package app.Components

Class Client

java.lang.Object
fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
app.Components.Client
All Implemented Interfaces:
fr.sorbonne_u.components.ComponentI
public class Client extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
Represents a client component in a sensor network system, responsible for initiating and managing queries to sensors through a network of nodes. This component is designed to interact with both a central register and individual sensor nodes to perform various query tasks based on configured parameters. This class extends AbstractComponent to utilize its lifecycle management and networking capabilities, integrating several custom outbound ports for communication with other system components.

Usage includes connecting to a clock server for timing operations, executing scheduled queries, and handling responses. It also manages its own lifecycle events such as starting, executing, finalizing, and shutting down, with detailed logging at each step.

Version:
1.0
Author:
